while plenty comfortable for      wear  the diagonal line texture seems to trap chlorine and soap residue and requires a thorough scrubbing every few days   i m also disappointed to see that it s connected to the watch via two star head screws   when the strap inevitably fails  i ll have to hope garmin has replacements available   a standard watch strap would have been much preferred here workoutsi have had the chance to try the fr   out across a varied set of workouts including swims  indoor treadmill runs  and outdoor runs   when outdoors the gps tracking is as accurate as my phone s
